rows.label: xs01040150_MSG0001
rows.name:
My introduction is a bit late, but
I'm Nagi Kentarou.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01040150_MSG0002
rows.name:
I'm the captain of the interstellar emigration ship, the White Whale.
Or rather, I was the captain, I suppose.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01040150_MSG0003
rows.name:
Currently, the Provisional Government has entrusted me
with all military and police affairs in NLA.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01040150_MSG0004
rows.name: He's my superior officer, too.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01040150_MSG0005
rows.name:
He should also be able to give advice
regarding your place to live and work.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01040150_MSG0006
rows.name:
Can't the newbie just join BLADE
and live here?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01040150_MSG0006_m
rows.name:
Can't the newbie just join BLADE
and live here?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01040150_MSG0006_f
rows.name:
Can't the newbie just join BLADE
and live here?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01040150_MSG0007
rows.name:
I intend for this person to stay here for now, but as for affiliation,
I want to respect the individual's own wishes.

rows.label: xs01040150_MSG0007_m
rows.name:
I intend for him to stay here for now, but
as for affiliation, I want to respect his own wishes.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01040150_MSG0007_f
rows.name:
I intend for her to stay here for now, but
as for affiliation, I want to respect her own wishes.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01040150_MSG0008
rows.name: Besides, it seems the survivor has some kind of amnesia.

rows.label: xs01040150_MSG0008_m
rows.name: Besides, it seems like he have some kind of amnesia.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01040150_MSG0008_f
rows.name: Besides, it seems like she have some kind of amnesia.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01040150_MSG0009
rows.name: What? Is that true?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01040150_MSG0010
rows.name:
It seems our guest doesn't remember anything
about Earth or the White Whale, except for a personal name.

rows.label: xs01040150_MSG0010_m
rows.name:
It seems he doesn't remember anything about Earth or the White Whale,
except for his own name.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01040150_MSG0010_f
rows.name:
It seems she don't remember anything about Earth or the White Whale,
except for her own name.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01040150_MSG0011
rows.name: I see...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01040150_MSG0012
rows.name:
Then again, even our memories of this planet
only go back two months.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01040150_MSG0013
rows.name: It shouldn't take very long to get caught up.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01040150_MSG0014
rows.name: That's true.[ST:wait

rows.label: xs01040150_MSG0015
rows.name: Okay then... what should we start with?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01040150_JNK0010
rows.name: Show Interest

rows.label: xs01040150_SEL0011
rows.name: Ask for details about this planet.

rows.label: xs01040150_JNK0020
rows.name: Question

rows.label: xs01040150_SEL0021
rows.name: Ask what BLADE is.

rows.label: xs01040150_JNK0030
rows.name: Prompt

rows.label: xs01040150_SEL0031
rows.name: Hurry the registration procedures

rows.label: xs01040150_MSG0016
rows.name: Going back two years from now[ST:wide ]―[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01040150_MSG0017
rows.name:
Our home planet, Earth, was suddenly
caught in a battle between two alien civilizations.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01040150_MSG0018
rows.name:
Faced with aliens possessing immense power and advanced technology,
we humans were powerless[ST:wide ]―[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01040150_MSG0019
rows.name:
Earth turned to scorched earth,
and then[ST:wide ]― it was annihilated.[ST:wide ]―[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01040150_MSG0020
rows.name:
I wonder if I hadn't been there,
maybe that wouldn't have happened, and Earth and humanity would still be[ST:wide ]―[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01040150_MSG0021
rows.name: What are you talking about, Elma?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01040150_MSG0022
rows.name:
Isn't it precisely because you were there that we could carry out
the Earth Life Emigration Project?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01040150_MSG0023
rows.name:
Even though unexpected things happened,
we're still here, alive.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01040150_MSG0025
rows.name: We got sidetracked.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01040150_MSG0026
rows.name:
Even if we lost our home planet,
the species had to survive.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01040150_MSG0027
rows.name:
What the people who thought that carried out
was the Earth Life General Emigration Plan.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01040150_MSG0028
rows.name:
Our journey after escaping Earth on the White Whale
lasted about two years.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01040150_MSG0028_2
rows.name: Those were hard days.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01040150_MSG0029
rows.name:
Nevertheless, our goal was to find a habitable planet
and settle there.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01040150_MSG0030
rows.name: Our resolve was strong.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01040150_MSG0031
rows.name: But the journey came to a sudden end[ST:wide ]―[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01040150_MSG0032
rows.name:
Those alien civilizations
seemed dead set on wiping us out.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01040150_MSG0033
rows.name: They kept sending pursuit forces after us.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01040150_MSG0034
rows.name:
But, for better or worse, when the White Whale lost navigation due
to the enemy attack, this Planet Mira was right in front of us.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01040150_MSG0035
rows.name:
The damaged hull
could not withstand atmospheric entry.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01040150_MSG0036
rows.name:
We used the power we had left
to soft-land the Residential Unit.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01040150_MSG0037
rows.name:
And so, once we reached the ground,
we gathered the survivors.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01040150_MSG0038
rows.name:
Centered around the Residential Unit,
we built humanity's first city on this planet.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01040150_MSG0039
rows.name: And that's how the Provisional Government was formed.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01040150_MSG0040
rows.name: As for BLADE[ST:wide ]―[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01040150_MSG0041
rows.name: "Beyond the Logos Artificial Destiny Emancipator."[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01040150_MSG0042
rows.name: Take the first letters, and you get BLADE.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01040150_MSG0043
rows.name:
It's an organization that didn't exist back when we were travelling, before the crash.
Or rather, there just wasn't any need for it then.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01040150_MSG0044
rows.name:
In any case, being attacked by unknown enemies
and crash-landing here on Mira changed everything.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01040150_MSG0045
rows.name:
Securing food and water,
exploring Mira, maintaining public order in NLA...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01040150_MSG0046
rows.name:
Plus many other activities...
The Provisional Government couldn't possibly handle it all alone,[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01040150_MSG0047
rows.name:
so, BLADE was organized
to take on those activities.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01040150_MSG0048
rows.name:
Since the core group came from the Coalition Military before the crash,
most members are former soldiers.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01040150_MSG0049
rows.name: And here's the important part.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01040150_MSG0050
rows.name:
BLADE has another important role
apart from those activities.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01040150_MSG0051
rows.name: That's the search for the Life Point.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01040150_MSG0052
rows.name: Take a look at this.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01040150_MSG0053
rows.name:
Originally, the White Whale carried many more people
who were still asleep.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01040150_MSG0054
rows.name: That facility was called the Life.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01040150_MSG0055
rows.name: This is the overall schematic for it.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01040150_MSG0056
rows.name:
After escaping Earth, the only ones awake on board,
other than the flight crew and combat personnel,[ST:wide ]―[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01040150_MSG0057
rows.name:
And of course, some military,
so we could defend ourselves if necessary.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01040150_MSG0058
rows.name:
But when we crashed on Mira,
the Life separated from the ship's hull, too.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01040150_MSG0059
rows.name:
It broke into several blocks
and scattered all over the planet's surface.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01040150_MSG0060
rows.name: That's why, the place where the Life is[ST:wide ]―[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01040150_MSG0061
rows.name:
In other words, we have to find the Life Point
and rescue the sleeping people.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01040150_MSG0062
rows.name:
The search for these Life Point is
BLADE's primary objective.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01040150_MSG0063
rows.name: When I found you, I was in the middle of a search mission myself.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01040150_MSG0066
rows.name:
All residents living here in NLA
must register their name, age, occupation, naturally,[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01040150_MSG0067
rows.name:
but also their assets and health condition.
Registration is mandatory.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01040150_MSG0068
rows.name: We're the only Earthlings who made it to Mira.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01040150_MSG0069
rows.name:
We'd appreciate it if you understand
it's a measure necessary for humanity's survival.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01040150_MSG0070
rows.name:
If you register, you'll be able to receive
various public services, too.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01040150_MSG0071
rows.name:
I ended up talking for a long time.
You probably need to organize your thoughts too.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01040150_MSG0072
rows.name: Lin-kun.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01040150_MSG0073
rows.name:
For a change of pace, why don't you show our guest around
the BLADE Area a bit?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01040150_MSG0074
rows.name: I'm a bit tired from talking, myself.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01040150_MSG0076
rows.name: Okay!

rows.label: xs01040150_MSG0076_02
rows.name: Let's head out right away![ST:wait ]
